description: This ground floor flat was renovated in 2021//22  to create a two bedroom flat, courtyard lightwell, and open living space within the ground floor of a period end of terrace house (previously divided in the 1980â€™s).

events.name: Drop in
events.notes: Please let us know if you plan to visit. Doing so allows the venue to plan ahead and you will be notified by email about any changes to the programme that might affect your visit.

factsheet.heading: Location
paragraphs:
This property is located in Brixton and occupies the ground floor of a period terrace house. 
Just a short walk from central Brixton or a couple of minutes further from Clapham North.

factsheet.heading: Project Description
paragraphs: The flat was purchased as a 1 bedroom property with the view to renovate the space into a 2 bedroom family home. The renovations involved changing the use of every space, moving the living accommodation to the rear connecting the spaces to the garden and relocating the bedrooms to the front of the house. The brief included the use of smart home technology through the renovations: lighting, watering, smoke detection, appliances and AV. Storage was important to consider with the use of every available space. The flat design also allowed some flexibility to allow the family to grow.

location.address: 2 Bythorn Street, Ground Floor Flat, SW9 8AQ
travel_info: Train: Clapham Junction, Clapham High Street, Brixton
Additional travel info: A short walk from both Brixton and Clapham. Access by car only from Bedford Road due to Low Traffic Neighbourhood
